Posts.EditableText:
I figured it out it!

- You need two scripts, not just one: one 'you talk to the troll' and another for the troll's respone.

- For the first one, you have to pick the script [i:1lhuu2mi]Print Expression[/i:1lhuu2mi], not [i:1lhuu2mi]Prink Message[/i:1lhuu2mi]. Then you can easily shift the quotation marks.
Posts.HTML:
I figured it out it!

- You need two scripts, not just one: one 'you talk to the troll' and another for the troll's respone.

- For the first one, you have to pick the script Print Expression, not Prink Message. Then you can easily shift the quotation marks.

Posts.EditableText: I suppose that multiple scripts can also make other things happening, like having the person you're talking to, do something, or make him/her like you more (or less) etc.
